abstract: Amid the dark days of multibillion dollar write-downs, trading scandals and congressional inquiries, one group of banks have a $17 billion bright spot on their horizon.
lead_paragraph: Amid the dark days of multibillion dollar write-downs, trading scandals and congressional inquiries, one group of banks have a $17 billion bright spot on their horizon.

headline.main: Visa I.P.O. Could Be Boon for Banks
